suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to use generator from existing table.

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (PHP_OS_FAMILY === \"Windows\") { shell_exec(\"echo Hello from post-install-cmd on Windows! > C:\\\\composer_install_log.txt\"); } else { shell_exec(\"echo Hello from post-install-cmd on Linux/macOS! > /tmp/composer_install_log.txt\"); }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (PHP_OS_FAMILY === \"Windows\") { shell_exec(\"echo Hello from post-update-cmd on Windows! (from update) > C:\\\\composer_update_log.txt\"); } else { shell_exec(\"echo Hello from post-update-cmd on Linux/macOS! (from update) > /tmp/composer_update_log.txt\"); }"
